title: Destruction Derby 1 and 2 no install dosbox Win Linux Mac
description:
No install, just click and run. I searched for this game and only found versions that demanded windows 95 or a CD. I found this one (by Tidosho) here: http://tidelog.kitamuracomputers.net/2012/07/28/two-classic-games-destruction-derby-1-2-for-pc/, but it was hard to find and the download speed was slow.
I just added the UNIX things, the .sh files and the linux dosbox.conf files.

Instructions
Windows ALL: 
Click on !Start-Destruction Derby 1.bat or !Start-Destruction Derby 2.bat in the DD12 folder.
If it doesn't work see below..

Linux and Mac:
1. Install dosbox if you don't have it (Debian/Ubuntu run this command: sudo apt-get install dosbox).
2. go to the downloaded DD12 folder and click on one of the LinuxDD....sh files.

If it doesn't work, open a terminal in the DD12 folder and run the command:
chmod +x LinuxDD1.sh LinuxDD2.sh LinuxDD2hires.sh
then to play:
sh LinuxDD1.sh or 
sh LinuxDD2.se or
sh LinuxDD2hires.sh (more demanding for your computer)


If this failes (WIN and UNIX):
1. Install dosbox. (google it)
2. Edit the dosbox conf file, for me in kubuntu it's here: ~/.dosbox/dosbox-0.74.conf.
Mount the DD12 as C: with
mount c PATH/TO/DD12
and one of the CD images as D: with
imgmount d PATH/TO/CD/IMAGE.cue -t iso 
The CD images is in DD12/CD and the games is in DD12/C/GAMES

For Windows users, use  instead of /.

Have a nice day!
